Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item holds great value to me due to its exceptional quality and functionality. I am extending this opportunity to purchase it directly from me at an exclusive price of $200. I believe this is a fantastic deal considering the benefits and features it offers. Please let me know if you're interested in making this acquisition. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
